name: Mark/Space
overview:
Mark/Space is about data sync and sharing as it relates to cool gadgets.

Over the life of the company, we have done software for modems, fax machines, pagers, handhelds/PDAs and mobille phones and tablets. Involved in the Mac OS industry since 1987, we expanded over the years to Windows and Cloud (server) solutions. Today we focus on making various handheld devices play nice with PCs, Macs, the cloud, and each other.

With strong roots in direct to consumer sales, we expanded into OEM development, and have done projects for or in partnership with Motorola, Microsoft, Nokia, Palm, Amazon and Barnes & Noble.

Our Missing Sync line of software connects Android, iPhone/iPad, RIM/BlackBerry, Palm Pre, Palm OS, Windows Mobile and Nokia/Symbian based mobile devices to Macs and PCs.

Our Fliq line brings “beaming” of contacts, photos, files, tasks and notes to handhelds and desktops, in “best of breed” PIM applications available for download or bundle. You will find Fliq apps on iOS and Android devices, as well as on Barnes & Noble Nook and Amazon Kindle Fire.

Our GoGadget line of media sync software has been selected by top-tier OEMs such as Motorola, Microsoft, Nokia and Palm to provide media sync “that grandma could use” to their lineups.

We support all platforms – desktop and smartphone – as well as all data types. Contacts, tasks, events, notes, bookmarks, video, music, ringtones, podcasts, photos, files, call logs, and text messages.

We’re the Sync Experts!
